item.description: A simpler way to manage your dotfiles Hello am edd I have been having trouble with configuration since i started using docker for my development. item.title: Smart Caps Lock: Control and Escape functionality
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Eduuh Muraya)
item.description: Smart Caps Lock: Remap to Control AND Escape (Linux, Mac, Windows) Escape if you tap Caps Lock alone. Send Control if you press Caps Lock with another key. send caps lock if you press both shift keys together For vim , emacs and normal day typing GNU/Linux Step 1. Install XCAPE Install XCAPE (xcape). (Linux utility to configure modifier keys to act as other keys when pressed and released on their own.
